issue.title: Basket : Enable to select by predefined perimeter
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Using predefined perimeter (WFS services) to select the order extent is not working anymore.

The name of the selected features are not visible in the basket page and selected features are not saved in database.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Order extent defined with WFS features are correctly saved in database and correctly exposed to the extraction service.
